[Middle Layer]

Public Member Functions

const UINT8 * GetCertBuffer () const
 return the pointer to the certificate payload
UINT16 GetCertSize () const
 returns the size of the certificate payload
UINT GetCertType () const
 returns the type of the certificate: 0=WTLS, 1=X509, 2=X9.68, other values means reserved
UINT8 * GetKeyIdBuffer () const
 returns the buffer which contains the key id
UINT8 GetKeyIdLength () const
 returns length of key id
MexeCertType GetMexeCertType () const
 returns the type of the certificate where it is residing on SIM/USIM: ORPK,ARPK,TPRPK
BOOLEAN IsAuthorityCert () const
 returns if the certificate identify an authority as defined in the descriptor
BOOLEAN IsValid () const
 returns if the certificate is valid as defined in the parameter indicator of the descriptor
 SimMexeCertificate (MexeDescriptor *certdesc, UINT8 *certbuffer, UINT16 certsize)
 constructor shall only be used by APOXI internal, memory will be allocated by APOXI
 ~SimMexeCertificate ()
 destructor only deleted the payload certbuffer, descriptor must be held by APOXI

Detailed Description

SimMexeCertificate contains the certificate payload of a certain DF-Mexe entry, objects are delivered by APOXI and shall be deleted after usage, content is defined in 3GPP TS 51.011 10.4.4.2
